name: Робот-кладовщик

description.ua: Дружній робот-кладовщик, який розгублений через переплутані ящики. Має великі круглі очі та квадратне тіло.
description.en: Friendly warehouse robot, confused because boxes got mixed up. Has big round eyes and boxy body.

visual_traits.body: Boxy silver-blue metallic body with rounded corners
visual_traits.head: Rounded rectangular head, slightly tilted
visual_traits.eyes: Two large circular LED eyes, sky blue color, expressive
visual_traits.arms: Thin mechanical arms with simple claw hands
visual_traits.legs: Small wheels or short stubby legs
accessories: Small antenna on top of head
visual_traits.expression: Confused but friendly, head tilted to the side

prompt: Cute friendly warehouse robot character, boxy silver-blue metallic body with rounded corners, large circular LED eyes glowing sky blue, small antenna on head, thin mechanical arms with claw hands, short stubby legs, holding tiny clipboard, confused expression with tilted head, name tag 'SORT-1' on chest. Style: flat design illustration, soft shadows, rounded shapes, warm friendly colors, children's book illustration style, simple clean background, character design sheet. No realistic textures, no scary elements, no sharp edges.
negative_prompt: realistic, photorealistic, 3d render, scary, dark, gloomy, sharp edges, complex background, multiple characters, text, watermark, signature, blurry, low quality, distorted
